documents.document: @GovMikeHuckabee We’re supposed to feel bad cause he shed a tear - I wept for 8 long years out of disgust. Finally shed tears of joy Nov 8th
@DanaPerino My twitter feed is filled with so much vitriol and vile retweets - and then this pops up! God bless you Jasper! (and Dana too).
@FoxNews And we care why?
@TooMarvelously Oh for the love of all that’s holy! How stupid is @MaxineWaters. WTF - I can’t even believe this.
@Ianderson444 I have as well, and will keep on reporting to @Twitter. Let’s just keep overwhelming their feed!
@Ianderson444 @AnnCoulter When someone is threatened, all followers should rpt it to @Twitter. Maybe those numbers will get their attention.
@Ianderson444 @marchaig And yet @Twitter does NOTHING when death threats & threats of violence against @DLoesch are appropriately reported.
@TooMarvelously Hey @springsteen I don’t care who you are or what your politics are, NEVER disparage your country. It gave you opportunities
@theblaze I’m embarrassed by Bruce Springsteen.
@darrickcleaves @DLoesch @NC5_RSchleicher Prayers up!
@iopflygirl Gorgeous. I always wanted to go on those Viking River cruises through Europe. I always see the ads on PBS.
@LawrenceBJones3 Great show last night subbing in for @DLoesch
@LeahRBoss I think you and your 77,000 followers can handle @azantifa and their 57 followers.
@FoxNews Obama was a disgrace for 8 years. I hope our new @POTUS can correct all of that damage. I support & pray for @realDonaldTrump
@realDonaldTrump Thank you! Hopefully the middle class will get a break. I know I certainly need one!
@iopflygirl Don’t let mean people ruin your day. I think mean people use Twitter cause they’re cowards & hide behind it. Their loss.
@BretBaier @debbie2735 This made my day! Actually made me smile! Thx 😁
And this is why I love @AdamBaldwin - wonder if he ever received a reply. https://t.co/YSjJsOL8u6
@robin11dr @iopflygirl Person by person we can make a difference. I used to get caught up, now I just block or unfollow. Keeping it positive
@MZHemingway I read it earlier & really enjoyed your thoughts on this. Great message!
@iopflygirl I’m a Repub & Trump supporter & I don’t condone hate. I unfollowed that person. Glad to “meet” you. We can be better 🙂
@iopflygirl Getting to the point where you’re damned if you do, damned if you don’t. My head is spinning. Sorry you’re being trolled. 🇺🇸
.@DLoesch Just listened to @POTUS speech & realized that even tho not perfect, at least I don’t want to scream & throw something at the TV.
@SaraGonzalesTX Happy birthday! Hope your day is filled with fun & cake! Lots of cake! (now I’m just jealous) 🎂💐
Really great article by @MZHemingway https://t.co/ro94E7Wz5i
@ShannonBream @JaniceDean It’s a great episode. Love how much fun your podcast is.
@tomborelli @deneenborelli Can’t believe I missed it. I’m usually up that early too - but was up late caring for a sick dog & I overslept 😢
@SebGorka @jaketapper @POTUS Would like to have watched, but @CNN gives me a horrible rash. Just can’t stomach that channel.
@ClaytonMorris It’s actually not. If you go through her feed you’ll see she’s been getting pretty nasty. She doesn’t need to do that.
@justin_hart I took a pic & reported her to Twitter & to the bus on her feed. If not affiliated they should know. Doesn’t look good for them
.@DLoesch @alexa_lebron And, I copied the post to show them how vile she is. BTW, I’m sure her whopping 35 followers find her charming.
.@DLoesch Not sure who @alexa_lebron is, but she has a website on her Twitter feed. I contacted the company to find out if she’s affiliated.
@DLoesch @alexa_lebron Her feed is rampant with profanity, hate & wishing violence on people. I reported her to Twitter.
@ChrisLoesch @DLoesch Awww, that’s sweet. My husband & I celebrate our 16th on Valentines Day and he’s almost as complimentary. LOL
@RealJamesWoods That’s atrocious
@CHPLibrary Just registered for the event “SUNK: Mysteries Beneath the Waves of the Jersey Shore”. Can’t wait!
@RealJamesWoods Nothing like kicking Americans in the teeth. @Starbucks seems to have forgotten that they grew due to the American dream.
@ChrisLoesch WOW @DLoesch is so busy I can’t keep up! Grateful that you send out links & updates or I’d miss them all.
@DavidLimbaugh My 1st pick was @marcorubio - but I then 100% supported @realDonaldTrump because I believe in supporting the party & SCOTUS
@Team_neverquit @DLoesch @MarcusLuttrell Just added it to my podcast feed! Thx for the notice.
.@DLoesch @Malcolm_fleX48 Or, they can use the description coined by @scrowder & just say “gender fluid” 😉
.@SpeakerRyan Heard a rumor that mid-class may not see tax breaks until next year or 2. We’re dying here. We can’t wait much longer! @POTUS
@Conservative_VW Wake up call! I think that these protesters were so young at the time that they don’t have a clear recollection. I do
.@realDonaldTrump I wept for 8 years every time Obama opened his mouth. I support @POTUS - keep kicking butt!
. @realDonaldTrump @POTUS 100% with you. I’m not anyone famous, just a hard working woman proud to be a deplorable! Retweet #SupportTrump
@CahnEmily @mercedesschlapp @LoopEmma May be easier to start big & scale back over time - rather than the other way around. It’s overdue.
@eternallyam @JGilliam_SEAL @chuckschumer I’m starting to wonder what in the world is actually being taught these days.
@JGilliam_SEAL @chuckschumer @eternallyam I’m always amazed at how easily they like to twist the rules - always in their favor of course.
@frenchfortrump @timkaine @eternallyam Selective memory. I remember the attacks & the devastation. Let’s be safe, not sorry!
.@Twitter Get over yourself. No one cares what Twitter thinks.
.@antimarxistfrog @eternallyam Obama made such a mess of things - and here is one reason why. It’s gonna take some time to undo his crap!
.@GillianHTurner @Steve_Johnson__ Yes, now that @realDonaldTrump is @POTUS - I can agree with you on that. Obama made a real mess of things
.@ianbremmer @GillianHTurner Then let them pay for their upkeep. Who gives a rat’s ass what CEOs think. I don’t have any respect for them.
.@FoxNews Hey Canada, when they build their own enclaves, riddled with crime, which won’t allow law enforcement - what then?
.@KillerBeeShow Hey Canada, when they build their own enclaves, riddled with crime, which won’t allow law enforcement - what then?
@ffweekend For the first time ever, I disagree with @fatherjonathan
@JustinTrudeau @fatherjonathan Thanks! You can have them.
@GillianHTurner @POTUS @JustinTrudeau Yep, until one of their high rise buildings come down. It’s all great until people are killed.
@GillianHTurner And when one slips through that means us harm - will you be so quick to comment. I actually thought better of you. Not now.
@ChrisLoesch @KenWahl1 @decadesnetwork Great show. Season 1 was phenomenal. Living so close to AC during its heyday made it fun to watch.
.@ffweekend And once again, grateful for the mute button. Why did @FoxNews hire @marie_harff - spinner of fake news.
@micayleee @ChrisLoesch I used to bemoan the fact that I never had the opportunity to go to college - now, I’m not so sure I would fit in.
@FoxNews @Austan_Goolsbee Of course he would - another hack who has no idea what Americans want.
@FoxNews Of cause she did.
@ChrisLoesch @DLoesch Thx for sharing. I really enjoyed the article. Never heard of @firstthingsmag but I’ve followed & bookmarked the site
@ClayneCrawford I love the mix that goes from action to humor and to utter heartbreak for Riggs. That’s great writing & acting #LethalWeapon
@cvcardillo @realDonaldTrump Yes! Something that the lame stream media will never report.
.@DLoesch @INDIO_RADIO Are you saying that @Powells won’t help you do a book signing? I buy from them, but will stop. Back to Amazon!
.@FoxNews Love how well the mute button on my remote works whenever @Richardafowler opens his mouth.
@INDIO_RADIO Catching up on the @DLoesch podcast & you just mentioned Mitch Hedberg - brought a tear to my eye 😢 Damn, he was so funny
@AP @ChrisLoesch My 401k is cheering too!
@LifeNewsHQ @newsbusters She’s a disgrace. Used to be on Fox, but I guess it was too conservative for her.
@ChrisLoesch @DLoesch @KellyannePolls Once again, @gatewaypundit feeding a false narrative. What an ass!
.@RealJamesWoods Another liberal heard from & unfollowed! https://t.co/LpjBLNeE3p
I follow a lot of book bloggers & authors - most of them pretty liberal & nasty about Trump. But this one takes the… https://t.co/VjceYPFJor
@KristySwansonXO @TuckerCarlson I enjoyed seeing you on the show. Glad you were able to share your opinion. Love you on @hallmarkchannel
@DLoesch @ChrisLoesch @theblaze I’m so enraged by this! Will this crap ever end? https://t.co/sRh4rkfRoI
@funnyrealfact Gotta love a boxer! Best dogs ever. Be careful of those hips though.
@DanaPerino A French classmate said she was referring to eating the crust of bread, which was usually cut off & discarded. Not sure if true.
@kirastokesfit @candacecbure Holy cow! Awesome.
@DLoesch @KristySwansonXO She’s great. Her Christmas movie that is shown every year on @hallmarkchannel is still my all time favorite.
@RealDeanCain @TuckerCarlson @FoxNews I’m sure he’s always the smartest guy in the room - but he’s also so likable.
@KillerBeeShow Beautiful girl! I miss having a large dog. We went from boxers to toy poodles. Not sure how that happened 🙂🐶
@TheBrandonMorse Your mom would be proud that you remembered your manners, even when faced with such an ass hat! Or should it be a vag hat?
@Conservative_VW Time to start draining that swamp as well! Fire her!
.@ChrisLoesch @DLoesch No one would dare. You seem like a nice guy & good husband, but I bet you could be a pretty scary dude when pushed!
@IngrahamAngle @FoxNews @TuckerCarlson No surprise. A lot of people stopped watching MKelly. She tried to be tough, came across as bitchy.
@BretBaier Awesome! I always stop & listen to @SteveHiltonx - although that could be the accent 😳
@SheilaGunnReid I’ve been following you for a bit now - but why is it whenever I see your name I think it says “Ray Gun” 😳 My odd brain.
.@DLoesch That’s one bitter loser. Hey @Lin_Dolin go back to crying in a corner with your safety pin. Damn, I was trying to be good today.
@DarkHistoryPod Maybe with a different headline & pic & maybe at a later date. People are on pins & needles ready to explode. But I get it 🙂
@RealJamesWoods 😂😂😂😂 This is awesome!
.@Conservative_VW WTF is wrong with these people? I just don’t understand this way of thinking.
@DarkHistoryPod Really! You’re better than this (at least I thought so).
@TomiLahren Wow, I’m shocked to see the hateful & disgusting comments directed at you. Sending prayers your way. How do you stay so strong?
.@theblaze Somehow I don’t think @FLOTUS is crying in a corner, or wearing a safety pin over this.
.@AdamBaldwin @NolteNC Ummm…he just did. And now, so did I!
.@FoxNews And another has-been heard from.
@mashable I’ve completely lost respect for @jk_rowling
@TheBrandonMorse Agree! I never understood why people care to know the intimate details of someone they don’t know. Or know for that matter
